for, in, or relating to the epidermis (= the thin outer layer of the skin): Stretch marks are caused by the breakdown of epidermal fibres. These topical antibiotics penetrate the epidermal barrier well. We discuss some potential clinical applications of epidermal stem cell technology.
More examplesFewer examplesThe doctor removed a large epidermal cyst from her scalp. A histologic section of the skin showed epidermal oedema.A shallow skin defect like this may be caused by epidermal disease and does not result in scarring.Researchers studied the effects of epidermal growth factor on ovarian follicles.
